Changes and New in the product

    * File synchronization ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ you can synchronize files between different computers and local folders (e.g. a USB device) through a local network or over the Internet;
    * NAS support ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Acronis True Image Home 2012 now distinguishes NASs as separate devices and suggests them as a location in all browsing operations;
    * Nonstop Backup over network ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Acronis Nonstop Backup now can be run to network shares, especially to NAS devices;GPT and UEFI support ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ starting with this release we, support UEFI-based computers. Please note, this doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t include Apple hardware support. In addition, you do not need to install Plus Pack to work with GPT disks.
    * Extended Capacity Disk support ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ support of large drives (2TB+) on MBR computers.
    * Changes in scheduler ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ added two options:
    * 1. ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œstartup delayÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, which allows for the running of tasks on a computer start with delay.
    * 2. ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œretry on failureÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, which performs several retries to complete a task before it is declared failed;
    * Integrated Online Backup ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ now online backup is integrated into Acronis True Image Home 2012 and such backups are shown among other Acronis backups;
    * Improved logs ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ we added a calendar view and made some improvements to make logs more complete and user-friendly;
    * Improved UI ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ we took into account many customersÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ complaints.

Fixed issues

    * A user without Administrator privileges cannot back up his or her e-mail account (ATIHIIOXII-2760).
    * Sometimes True Image service hangs on computer shut-down (ATIHIIOXII-2749).
    * ThereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s an unnecessary message ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œBackup validation Task execution failedÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ on every Windows start (ATIHIIOXII-3566).
    * Automatic clean-up based on a backup size doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t work (ATIHIIOXII-2218).
    * ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œNetwork connection speedÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ limit doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t work (ATIHIIOXII-1021).
    * An error message ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œThe specified file doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t existÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ appears when editing a task if the corresponding backup has been deleted (ATIHIIOXII-2889).

Known Issues

    * It is impossible to delete versions of a file in online backups (ATIHIIOXII-2112).
    * The version history for a file is absent after deleting this file from the sync folder (ATIHIIOXII-4346).
    * Part of e-mail messages is duplicated after the recovery of Outlook from an e-mail backup (ATIHIIOXII-3106).
    * The warning ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œLink target was not backed upÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ appears in the logs of a backup (ATIHIIOXII-3231). This happens when Acronis True Image Home 2012 tries to back up symlinks. In this case, the files and folders to which these links lead are not backed up.
    * The drive letter D:\ is assigned to the System Reserved partition, if you view a backup of the whole system disk in Backup Explorer (ATIHIIOXII-991). The system Reserved Partition is shown incorrectly only in Backup Explorer. Nevertheless, recovery is performed correctly.
    * It is impossible to validate a backup if its differential version was deleted (ATIHIIOXII-2485).
    * Backup progress is not shown if ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“Run this program in compatibility mode for: Windows XP SP3' is enabled for TrueImage.exe (ATIHIIOXII-1916).
    * ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s impossible to browse Acronis Online Storage while Try&Decide is running (ATIHIIOXII-5661).
    * The Extended Capacity Manager functionality is absent on a rescue media (ATIHIIOXII-5530). Please, use this functionality in the Windows version of Acronis True Image Home 2012.
    * ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s impossible to delete a version of a .zip file backup from within Backup Explorer, if the backup is located on a network share (ATIHIIOXII-5698).
    * Acronis Online Storage clean up doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t work (ATIHIIOXII-5684).
    * Acronis True Image 2012 Home UI may hang for a minute during start up, if a mapped network share is unavailable (ATIHIIOXII-2014).
    * Recovery of any custom folder in Microsoft Exchange Account fails in MS Office 2010 (ATIHIIOXII-5422).
    * The ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œShutdown after the backup creationÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ option does not work if the user has logged off from Windows (ATIHIIOXII-2190).
    * If a NAS works via the Bonjour protocol, itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s not detected under rescue media (ATIHIIOXII-4272).
    * The ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œExplore and downloadÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ item in the Backup Explorer context menu for Syncs doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t work (ATIHIIOXII-5682).
    * ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s impossible to explore an encrypted online backup if it was created from another PC. Trying to explore the backup results in the error ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œThe remote server is unavailableÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ (ATIHIIOXII-5737).
